mapper.sql: INSERT INTO DISTRIBUTED_TRANSACTION_PART( ID, DISTRIBUTED_TRANSACTION_MAIN_ID, INVERSE_OPER, INVERSE_OPER_TYPE, TRANS_TABLE_NAME, TRANS_PRIMARY_KEY_VAL, TRANSACTION_STATUS, CREATE_DATE )VALUES( #{id}, #{distributedTransactionMainId}, #{inverseOper}, #{inverseOperType}, #{transTableName}, #{transPrimaryKeyVal}, #{transactionStatus}, #{createDate} )
